definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: cohabitation (NH [[עוֹנׇה]] time, also = BH; poss. response or correspondence, commerce, from above √; or else euphemist., specific time, SS (cf. Ba:ES 17, from √ 0’ny); Thes from [[עון]] dwell);—sf. [[עׂנׇתָהּ]] Ex 21:10 (E) i.e. her marriage rights.—Ho 10:10 v. [[עָוֹן]]
